newsitem.title: UK: RESEARCH ALERT-Salomon keeps Arcelik buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Salomon keeps Arcelik buy.

text.p: Salomon Brothers on Thursday reiterated its buy recommendation on Turkey's leading durable goods producer Arcelik AS following first half results released earlier this week.
Demand for white goods had been strong in the first half but competitive pressure had pushed prices down an average 10 percent, Salomon noted.
Demand is expected to slow towards the end of the third quarter but Arcelik's second half should still be better than the period last year in volume sales, it said.
The company reported net profit of 8.85 trillion lira in the six months to June versus 3.48 trillion a year ago.
Salomon said it was maintaining its full year forecasts for net profit of 15.8 trillion in 1997 and 31.5 trillion in 1998.
